name: Service Corporation International
description: Service Corporation International (SCI) is the largest provider of funeral and cemetery services in North America. Founded in 1962, SCI operates more than 1,500 funeral homes and 500 cemeteries across the United States and Canada. The company is dedicated to providing meaningful funeral and memorial services to families at their time of need. SCI's portfolio includes various brands and service offerings, from traditional funerals to direct cremations and memorial services. The company emphasizes the importance of pre-planning and offers a range of options for families to ensure their wishes are honored. In addition to its funeral services, SCI manages a variety of cemeteries that provide options for burial, mausoleum entombment, and cremation memorialization. With a focus on compassion, integrity, and customer service, SCI is committed to helping families celebrate the lives of their loved ones while navigating the complexities of end-of-life arrangements. The company continually seeks to improve its services through technology and innovation, ensuring that families receive the highest level of care and support during difficult times.
